Question: John wants to buy a pizza which costs $k, He only possesses n coins and the cashier will accept only two. Find the number of ways in which he can pay for his pizza.
Input Format: First line of input will be t the number of test cases, first line of each test case has 2 integers, integers n and k, next line contains n integers, the value of each coin.
Output Format: Output a single integer: the number of ways John can pay for his pizza.
